alert.note: Alert for Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:19PM CDT until August 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GARDEN AND WESTERN DEUEL COUNTIES... At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Chappell, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chappell, Mount Vernon and Intersection of Highway 27 and 9 Mile Road. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 78 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
